items.question: Are my API keys safe?
items.answer: Yes! API keys are stored only in your browser's session storage and are never sent to our servers. They are automatically cleared when you close the tab.

items.question: What audio formats are supported?
items.answer: We support most common audio formats including MP3, WAV, M4A, and WEBM. The maximum file size is 25MB (or larger if you compress it first).

items.question: Why do I need an OpenAI key?
items.answer: An OpenAI API Key is required for the Whisper transcription service, which converts speech to text. This is used regardless of which AI model you choose for summarization.

items.question: My audio is too large, what can I do?
items.answer: Trammarise has a built-in compression tool that will appear if your file is too large. Alternatively, you can trim the audio using our wave editor before processing.

byok.question: What does BYOK mean?
byok.answer: BYOK (Bring Your Own Key) means you provide your own OpenAI API key. This gives you full control and pay-as-you-go pricing directly from OpenAI, with no monthly fees.

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your billing period, and you can always downgrade to the free BYOK tier.

minutes.question: What happens if I exceed my minutes?
minutes.answer: You can purchase additional credits at any time. Unused minutes don't roll over, but you can always use your own API keys for unlimited processing.
